Articles.Content:
Uses docking ports magnetics to straiten itself (and wheels for more constraints)

Press 2 to get solar panels out and then 1 to get the hubs detached. go to one and trim it with E for rotation and the other with Q. you can rotate them the same way but it could cause problems if they get caught (sometimes all the time... ) this is not even close to perfect and is just a crude PoC. DOWNLOAD

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Great looking station dude, and you have an eye for nice pics too. Have you tried walking a kerbal along the inside of the ring? Is that a thing? Either way, good job mate.
